question: <h1> defines the less important heading.
<!DOCTYPE html> defines that this document is an HTML4 document.
Google “Google” part is called “attribute” of the (anchor) tag.
“class” is NOT one of core attributes of HTML.
HTML describes the structure of Web Page.
<i> tag will make the text italic.
<li> defines unordered list.

The letter “p” of

tag stands for “paragraph”.
For each HTML tag you can add attribute(s).
<html> tag should always have “lang” attribute and the value should be “ja”. <html lang=”ja”>
<meta> tag(s) should be nested inside <body> tag.
Character encoding should be defined always as shown below; <meta charset=”shift_jis”>
To create an HTML form all of the <input> elements should not always be nested inside <form> tag.
To create a select box you just only have to use <select> tag.
You need to add closing tag for <input> element(s).

“br” of
tag stands for “break”(line break).
To make an HTML form work properly you need to include necessary attributes in <form> tag.
To create an HTML table with border you do not need to give any attribute to <table> tag.
“tr” of <tr> tag stands for “table record”.
“th” of <th> tag stands for “table heading”.
“td” of <td> tag stands for “table definition”.
<table> tag and the descendant tag elements(<thead>, <tbody>, <tr>, <th>, <td>) can be used as a kind of grid system to arrange / allocate various HTML elements.
There’s no comment tag in HTML.
Internal CSS is the only one option to apply styles to an HTML.

Delphi is an IDE; Integrated Development Environment developed by Embarcadero Technologies. The name of the programming language is Object Pascal.
Object Pascal is a kind of procedural programming language, not an object oriented one.
Delphi programs are usually divided into source-code modules called scripts.
File extension of Delphi source file is “.pas”.
In Object Pascal language we always need to use Pascal Case. We can not use Camel Case, e.g. userName.

Object Pascal language has GC; Garbage Collector(*) so we do not mind of memory leak problems.
*GC; Garbage Collector---a form of automatic memory management.
You can define constant by using “const” keyword. You can change the value assigned after the definition.
“VCL” of VCL application stands for “Visual Component Library”
In Object Pascal language expression of “if statement” is like the following sample;
Object Pascal code block will start with “start” and then finish with “finish.”(with period);
As the naming convention for fields inside classes letter “T” will be prefixed at the beginning of the name.
If the class method is not static, you always need to invoke the constructor to create the class instance.
In Delphi you do not need to destroy created instance since there is GC; Garbage Collector.
Object Pascal is a kind of dynamically typed language.
An Enumerated represents an indexed collection of elements of the same type(called the base type).
Delphi can connect MySQL / Microsoft SQL Server databases by default without installing any other dependency.
Delphi can not connect to any API’s / web services.
In creating function you always need to set parameter(s) in it.
In setting parameters to function sometimes you do not need to define the data type.
In Object Pascal there’re two keywords to define methods, procedure and function. Both of them are functionally the same.

Correct assignment statement in Object Pascal is;
var variable: string;

answer2: Press Alt & click the name of procedure / function
answer3: Press Shift & click the name of procedure / function
correctanswer: Press Ctrl & click the name of procedure / function

question: Regarding .dcu files which of the following options is NOT correct?;

correctanswer: DCU is text-based file so you can view the inside with text editor.

answer3: In using Object Pascal we should follow as much as possible of the naming convention set in our organization.
correctanswer: In Object Pascal we do not need to mind of usage of ;(semi-colon) so much.
